title: How do music festivals invite bands? - Quora

response.answer_text: This depends on the stages offered at the  festival.  Most music festivals have different stages with different genres of music playing simultaneously.  For instance Ultra has 8 stages including Main stage - where you'll find mainstream, commercial house, Bao Dome - where you'll hear the best of electro house.  There is also Live stage - where live bands play.  If there is a stage offering live music, the music festival will invite bands.
